title: I need a teacher to teach me how to play this game
body:
I would like to play this game without making anyone get mad at me because i don't know how to play.
my skype is: elliotthenoob discord:Elliot#2117 I would like it if someone can help.

replies.body:
While I can't personally teach you the game, we've recently updated our [New Player Guide](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/new-player-guide#/?_k=gwrfdr), so I highly encourage you to check it out!

Outside of that, you can find many straightforward and helpful tutorials on youtube that can teach you specific lanes or concepts such as "freezing a lane" or "trading in lane" that should help you beyond the guide I linked.

Let me know if you have any questions.
